text: Lothar Claesges (3 July 1942 â€“ 12 November 2021) was a German cyclist. He won the gold medal in the Men's team pursuit at the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born in Krefeld, Germany. Claesges died on 12 November 2021 in Krefeld, at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German cyclists Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany
title: Lothar Claesges
